general: Today, the Moon in harmony with Saturn brings emotional clarity. Capricorns feel an increased need for structure and security in their daily lives. This is the perfect time to set clear and realistic goals.
love: Express your feelings sincerely to strengthen your bond.
work: Focus on the details, your diligence will be rewarded.
health: Take the time to relax, even a short break can revitalize.
advice: Patience is the key to your success today.
teaser: A day to build solid dreams.
